text: The Saint Andrew's Society of the State of New York, founded in 1756, is a charitable organization focused on helping Scots in the New York community. ==History== The Society is led by a President, First Vice President, Second Vice President and Managers. ==List of presidents== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
